metadata.title: CVE-2024-36964 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/9p: only translate RWX permissions for plain 9P2000Garbage in plain 9P2000's perm bits is allowed through, which causes itto be able to set (among others) the suid bit. This was presumably notthe intent since the unix extended bits are handled explicitly andconditionally on .u.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
